#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>
#include <string>
#include <cmath>
#include <algorithm>
#include <map>
#include <vector>

#define REP(a,b) for (int a = 0; a < b; a++)
#define FOR(a,b,c) for (int a = b; a <= c; a++)
#define RESET(a,b) memset(a,b,sizeof a)

#define PII pair<int,int>
#define MP make_pair
#define PB push_back
#define F first
#define S second

#define MAXD 1000000
#define K 100
#define EPS 1e-8
#define LL long long
using namespace std;

struct point{
	int x,y,r;
};

int T;
int N;
point ar[55];

double cari(double x, double y){
	double ret = 0;
	REP(i,N){
		double dx = x - ar[i].x;
		double dy = y - ar[i].y;
		double dist = sqrt(dx*dx + dy*dy);

//		printf("%lf %lf\n", dist, dist/ar[i].r);
		ret = max(ret, dist/ar[i].r);
	}

	return ret;
}

double cariy(double x){
	double ki = -MAXD;
	double ka = MAXD;

	REP(i,K){
		double d = ka - ki;

		double t1 = ki + d/3;
		double t2 = ki + d*2/3;

		double h1 = cari(x, t1);
		double h2 = cari(x, t2);
		if (h1 < h2){
			ka = t2;
		}else{
			ki = t1;
		}
	}

	return cari(x, ki);
}

double carix(){
	double ki = -MAXD;
	double ka = MAXD;

	REP(i,K){
		double d = ka - ki;

		double t1 = ki + d/3;
		double t2 = ki + d*2/3;

		double h1 = cariy(t1);
		double h2 = cariy(t2);
		if (h1 < h2){
			ka = t2;
		}else{
			ki = t1;
		}
	}

	return cariy(ki);
}

int main(){
	scanf("%d", &T);

	REP(jt,T){
		scanf("%d", &N);
		REP(i,N){
			scanf("%d%d%d", &ar[i].x, &ar[i].y, &ar[i].r);
		}

		printf("%lf\n", carix());
	}

	return 0;
}
